The ho-mobile app is updated with the bank SMS block and support for Google Pay and Apple Pay
04 Nov 2019, 18:56 by Nicola Ligas
Ho-mobile updates its Android app with the bank SMS and televoting block. From today on the other hand you will be able to receive payment SMSs from Intesa San Paolo and CheBanca !, but other banks will be added later. Furthermore the changelog also reports support for both Google Pay and Apple Pay for top-ups.
Actually they are all functions that had already arrived for a few days, even if the changelog was updated only today. It is however possible that the service still needs to be refined, and after all it is the operator himself who reports that for now it only works with two banks. To access the options in question, you must go to "my offer" and then to "block calls, data and text messages", where you will find the screen shown below, with all available blocking options.
